ValidationRule.description: Students can't be awarded an Academic scholarship during 1st year of study. Error Location: Field Scholarship.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Year_of_Study__c, "1"), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Scholarship__c , "Regular"), ISPICKVAL(Scholarship__c , "Increased"), ISPICKVAL(Scholarship__c , "Academic")) )
